quoteText: harmful, slanderous, unethical, defamatory, harassing, threatening or infringing upon intellectual property rights, rights of privacy or publicity of third parties, Yandex, Company and/or Partners, incites hatred, bigotry, racial, ethnic, sexual, religious or social discrimination or is insulting to any persons, groups and/or entities;
title: The service provides information about its attitude towards ethical, social or political problems or controversies
